Class PrudenceApplication

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Restlet
      org.restlet.Application
          com.threecrickets.prudence.PrudenceApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
Uniform
public class PrudenceApplication
extends Application

A Restlet Application that returns Status.CLIENT_ERROR_NOT_FOUND when it is stopped.

"Restlet" is a registered trademark of Noelios Technologies.

Author:
Tal Liron
See Also:
Restlet.start(), Restlet.stop()
